name: APPLE
description: An apple is a round, healthy fruit that is crisp and can taste sweet or tart.

name: STRAWBERRY
description: A strawberry is a small, red fruit with a sweet flavor and tiny seeds on its surface.

name: MANGO
description: A mango is a sweet, juicy tropical fruit with yellow or orange flesh and smooth skin.

name: GRAPE
description: Grapes are small, juicy fruits that grow in clusters on vines and can be eaten fresh.

name: AVOCADO
description: Avocados are creamy, nutrient-rich fruits with a smooth green skin and large seed.

name: GUAVA
description: Guava is a tropical fruit with a sweet, slightly tangy flavor, typically round or oval in shape.

name: PAPAYA
description: Papaya is a tropical fruit with sweet orange flesh, black seeds in the center, and greenish-yellow.

name: WATERMELON
description: Watermelon is a large, juicy fruit with a green rind and sweet, red or pink flesh filled.

name: PERSIMMON
description: Persimmon is a sweet, honey-flavored fruit with smooth orange skin and soft, jelly-like flesh.

name: DATES
description: Dates are sweet, chewy fruits with a wrinkled brown skin and a single pit inside.
